#summary Describes how to assign banners to ad places.

= Assigning Banners =

You should create a banner in the right panel and then drag it to a paddock of an ad place. As a result the banner is cloned. The binding between the original and the cloned banner still exists. The banner is identified by:
<ul>
<li>banner name</li>
<li>banner file</li>
</ul>
